title: Looking for Players
body: Are a team composed of housemates who are planning on taking it to the next level by playing in competitions, beginning with one in TU Chemnitz, Germany, in November. We play the roles of mid, top and supp mainly. Are looking for an ADC and jg, as well as back-ups for our roles, just like we'd want and the rules of the competitions have stated.

replies.body: Hey mate I see your chasing a jungler and adc, I main both roles aswell as support, add me and I'll tell you my story
